org.framed.orm.ui.editPolicy

Class ORMRelationConnectionEditPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies.AbstractEditPolicy
      • org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies.ConnectionEditPolicy
        • org.framed.orm.ui.editPolicy.ORMRelationConnectionEditPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.gef.EditPolicy, org.eclipse.gef.RequestConstants

    public class ORMRelationConnectionEditPolicy
extends org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies.ConnectionEditPolicy
    This ConnectionEditPolicy handels requests for the deletion of Relations and returns and creats the deletion commands for this purpose.
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski

    • Method Detail

      • getDeleteCommand

        protected org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command getDeleteCommand(org.eclipse.gef.requests.GroupRequest request)
        This method creats and returns command for the deletion of Relations. When the Relation, which the user wants to be deleted, is Relationship than the deletion command for RelationshipConstraints of the Relationship are created and returned as well, because a RelationshipConstraint can only exist with a Relationship. When the Relation, which the user wants to be deleted, is a RelationshipConstraint than the CallRelationshipConstraintsActionCommand is created and returned, because the deletion of RelationshipConstraints is spefically handled in this editor through the RelationshipConstraintsAction and the RolesDialog.
        Specified by:
        getDeleteCommand in class org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies.ConnectionEditPolicy
